actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to reduce from 65 to 60 the age at which a full spouse's annuity becomes payable (with a reduced annuity becoming payable at age 58).

summary.text: Reduces, under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937, from 65 to 60 the age at which a full spouse's annuity becomes payable. Provides for a reduced annuity becoming payable under such Act at age 58.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to reduce from 65 to 60 the age at which a full spouse's annuity becomes payable (with a reduced annuity becoming payable at age 58).
